properties.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Crowley County Including Ordway; Prowers County Including Lamar; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Kiowa County Including Eads
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 31 at 3:13AM MST until January 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
...A Red Flag Warning is in effect for gusty winds, low humidity
and dry fuels from Noon until 6 PM today, for fire weather zones
231 through 237 which includes Crowley, Otero, Bent, Kiowa,
Prowers, Baca and eastern Las Animas Counties...

The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag
Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in
effect from noon today to 6 PM MST this evening.

* Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 231...232...233...234...
235...236 and 237.

* Winds...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts of 25 to 35 mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent.

* Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for the rapid ignition,
growth and spread of fires.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can
contribute to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 231...232...233...234...235...236 AND 237
